Hello, Adventurer!

This is Hearthstone - Card Detail App.

Iâ€™ve made this to learn basics of AngularJS.

You can:

  • click name on the lists to see details of each card,
  • check for random card details,
  • search and order lists of cards,
  • add maximum 30 cards to list on the right, and mouseover graph to see their mana curve,

Thanks to Blizzard for inventing so many interesting and creative descriptions for each card. I laughed a lot when I was creating this app.
